Summary: Bright white pulsing/blinking light seen in daylight sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Antwerp
There were no other sightings in Antwerp on or around July 12th 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy girlfriend and i were coming home from defiance, oh at my sister's birthday dinner. we were driving home on u.s. 24 when my girlfriend seen something strange pulsing\blinking brilliant white light moving west in the same direction as us. she drew my attention to it and we watched it. the pulsing\blinking white light was very far away but it was still about the size of a quarter in the sky and seemed very out of place. it would pulse\blink every 2 or 3 seconds. when it would blink out you couldn't see anything producing the light. we watched it for about a minute and it then stopped and hovered, it then went straight up through the clouds and at the same speed it immediately dropped back down exactly in the same path it went up and then stopped exactly where it was before. then it started moving in the same direction again, but after another couple of minutes going west it simply suddenly disappeared.
